attributes.action: Lift the news blackout concerning the Hollie  Pedophile Ring and to Prosecute all those involved
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: From the age of just six, Hollie was repeatedly sexually abused by her father, Denis. Later, he began sharing his daughter with a gang of peadophile “swingers” that has been operating in Scotland for many years. The identities of a further seven child victims are already known. There is no question that the gang are well-connected, efficiently organised and totally ruthless. Our frightening story is that they are protected by individuals of “high standing” within the Scottish establishment.

rejection.details: This is a devolved matter and should be directed to the Scottish Executive.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
